column2: dessert was my favorite part even though I generally prefer savory over sweet. Being a yelper I picked up that they give a free dessert tapa for each guest. My wife and I ordered the ice cream sandwiches and the chocolate truffle. The truffle was an exceptionally rich block of truffle chocolate with a homemade creamy whipped cream dollop to the side. Very good
column3: but not really my cup of tea. The ice cream sandwiches were home made pumpkin iced cream between two ginger snap cookies
column4: with a bit of powdered sugar and cinnamon or nutmeg (not quite sure from the flavor explosion) sprinkled on top. I took a small bite of one and was blown away! We will be back if not solely for those ice cream sandwiches.
